title: A7J TOPUP UI redesign to clean white + purple professional theme

requirements.summary: Refresh global styling to a clean, professional white UI with #6C5CE7 purple accents, consistent typography/spacing, rounded corners, and soft shadows; remove dark/arena styling and heavy gradients.
acceptanceCriteria: All primary page backgrounds render as pure white (no dark sections).
Primary interactive elements (buttons/links/highlights) use #6C5CE7 (or theme token mapped to that value).
Gradient-heavy utility classes currently used in UI (e.g., hero overlays, gradient text/buttons, gradient card backgrounds) are removed or replaced with solid/very subtle styles.
Typography is a clean sans-serif site-wide with consistent heading/body scale and spacing.
Cards/sections use rounded corners and soft shadow; no harsh neon/glow effects.
All pages remain readable and visually consistent on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Align global theme tokens and base styles to a strict light theme (pure white backgrounds) with purple accent mapped to #6C5CE7, consistent typography defaults, and soft shadow/rounded styling; replace existing gradient helper classes (e.g., text-gradient-purple, btn-purple-gradient, gradient-purple-light) with solid/subtle non-gradient equivalents to prevent heavy gradients across the UI.

Update Tailwind theme extensions to support consistent spacing/typography/shadow utilities for the new clean style (e.g., ensure soft shadow tokens and a consistent sans-serif stack are available) and to reinforce the purple accent usage site-wide.

Standardize card styling for product tiles to match the new system (white/light-gray palette, rounded corners, soft shadow, no gradient backgrounds), ensuring responsive behavior remains intact. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Redesign header/navigation with left logo, required nav links, responsive mobile menu, and wallet balance display for authenticated users.
acceptanceCriteria: Desktop header shows the logo on the left and the specified navigation links in the header.
Mobile header uses a menu/sheet that includes the same navigation links.
Header displays the caller wallet balance (for authenticated users) and updates when wallet balance changes (via existing wallet query invalidation patterns).
Navigation labels match exactly: "Home", "Add Money", "Buy Points", "Topup Diamonds", "Earn Points".
No gaming-focused tagline remains in the header (replace with neutral/professional wording in English).

file_operations.description: Update header layout and styling to the clean white + purple theme; replace current nav set with the exact required labels and routes (Home, Add Money, Buy Points, Topup Diamonds, Earn Points) and ensure both desktop and mobile menus contain the same set; add a wallet balance display for authenticated users using existing wallet balance query hooks so it stays in sync with react-query invalidation. Continue using existing shadcn-ui primitives (Button/Sheet/DropdownMenu) without editing their sources (frontend/src/components/ui is read-only). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the overall shell/header area remains consistently white and responsive, and that any legacy dark/gradient styling is removed from the global layout wrapper so the redesigned header renders cleanly across pages.

requirements.summary: Redesign the Home page hero to a minimal professional white section with headline, subtitle, and a single "Add Money" CTA routing to the Add Money flow.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section has a pure white background (no background image and no large gradient overlays).
Hero contains a bold headline, a smaller subtitle, and a single primary CTA button labeled "Add Money".
CTA navigates to the Add Money page/route.
Hero and above-the-fold layout is responsive and looks clean on mobile and desktop.
Hero copy is in English and avoids gaming-arena tone (no "Gaming Top-Up" style messaging).

file_operations.description: Replace the current hero (background image + gradient overlays + gaming-themed copy) with a pure white, minimal hero containing an English professional headline/subtitle and a single primary CTA button labeled "Add Money" that routes to the existing /add-money flow; remove any hero background images and gradient overlays; ensure responsive spacing/typography. Continue using existing shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button/Card) without editing their sources. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update card/section styling across landing and core pages to use rounded corners, soft shadows, and light neutral backgrounds without gradient card backgrounds, maintaining responsive layouts.
acceptanceCriteria: Cards/sections (including promotional/offer sections on the Home page) use white/light-gray backgrounds, rounded corners, and soft shadows.
Gradient-backed cards/sections are replaced with solid or subtle neutral backgrounds.
Layouts maintain responsiveness (1-column on small screens, multi-column on larger screens where appropriate).
No sections use dark backgrounds or heavy gradients.

file_operations.description: Refactor promotional/offer sections and any remaining gradient-backed areas to use solid white/light-gray cards with rounded corners and soft shadows; keep the existing responsive grid behavior (mobile 1-col, larger multi-col) and remove any gradient utility usage in section headings/cards. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Adjust/replace shared helper classes (e.g., card-lift) and any remaining gradient-related utilities so cards/sections default to subtle shadows and neutral backgrounds without gradient fills.

requirements.summary: Redesign the footer to a light gray, responsive, professional layout with contact info, social links, and terms.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer background is light gray (not dark) and contrasts appropriately with white page background.
Footer includes clearly labeled contact information, social links, and a terms section/link area.
Footer layout is responsive (stacked on mobile, columns on desktop).
All user-facing text in the footer is in English.

file_operations.description: Redesign footer styling to a light gray background and restructure content into clear sections for Contact information, Social links, and Terms (e.g., Terms of Service/Privacy placeholders), ensuring English copy and responsive stacking/columns on different screen sizes. Continue using existing shadcn-ui primitives (e.g., Separator) without editing their sources. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
